ðŸ“– Summary: Curls App is a privacy-focused iOS application for logging workouts. It features a comprehensive exercise database, custom exercise creation, workout history and analytics, and a template system for reusable routines. The app prioritizes user privacy by operating entirely offline, storing data locally, and avoiding analytics or account requirements.
